tasks.title: Setup Project Repository
tasks.description: Create a new project repository on GitHub or similar version control platforms.

tasks.title: Define Project Structure
tasks.description: Organize the project into logical directories for backend, frontend, and documentation.

tasks.title: Select Technology Stack
tasks.description: Choose appropriate technologies for the project, such as Node.js for backend and React for frontend.

tasks.title: Implement Unified Database & API
tasks.description: Design a unified database schema and API architecture using RESTful principles.

tasks.title: Develop Core Member Management & Billing
tasks.description: Create foundational tools for member profiles, dues, and basic billing using a library like Stripe for payments.

tasks.title: Build Basic BI Dashboard
tasks.description: Develop a real-time dashboard for essential club metrics using a library like D3.js or Chart.js.

tasks.title: Implement Custom Branded Mobile App
tasks.description: Design and develop a premium, intuitive mobile app for member engagement using React Native.

tasks.title: Integrate Advanced Reservations System
tasks.description: Implement seamless booking for golf, dining, courts, simulators, and lessons using a scheduling library like FullCalendar.

tasks.title: Develop Digital Wallet / Contactless POS
tasks.description: Integrate secure, in-app payment processing and digital member card using a library like Apple Pay or Google Pay.

tasks.title: Implement AI Virtual Concierge
tasks.description: Develop a 24/7 chatbot for handling routine member inquiries using a library like Dialogflow.

tasks.title: Integrate GPS Pace of Play & Cart Management
tasks.description: Implement real-time cart tracking to manage pace and automate turf protection using GPS technology.

tasks.title: Develop IoT Sensor Integration
tasks.description: Create a platform to receive data from soil, weather, and energy sensors using IoT protocols like LoRaWAN.

tasks.title: Implement Automated Irrigation Control
tasks.description: Develop an AI-driven system using sensor data to optimize water usage.

tasks.title: Build Modern Event Management Tools
tasks.description: Create tools for planning and executing tournaments, weddings, and events with integrated billing and room diagramming.

tasks.title: Integrate Email/SMS Marketing Suite
tasks.description: Develop tools for segmenting the member database and sending targeted campaigns using a library like Mailchimp.

tasks.title: Implement Dynamic Pricing Engine
tasks.description: Develop an AI-powered pricing system for tee times and other amenities to maximize yield.

tasks.title: Enhance Cybersecurity Measures
tasks.description: Implement robust security features like multi-factor authentication and end-to-end encryption.

tasks.title: Develop Modular Pricing Structure
tasks.description: Create a flexible pricing model allowing clubs to start with a single module and add others as needed.

tasks.title: Implement White Glove Service Model
tasks.description: Offer comprehensive training and responsive customer support to ensure smooth technology adoption.

tasks.title: Conduct Market Analysis
tasks.description: Research the current market landscape to identify opportunities and challenges.

tasks.title: Develop Strategic Sales Approach
tasks.description: Create a tailored sales strategy focusing on key stakeholders like the Board of Directors and General Manager.

tasks.title: Build Business Case for Technology Adoption
tasks.description: Prepare a data-driven presentation highlighting ROI and strategic benefits for club leadership.

tasks.title: Establish Partnerships with Key Stakeholders
tasks.description: Foster relationships with influential committees and members to facilitate technology adoption.

tasks.title: Plan Phased Implementation Roadmap
tasks.description: Outline a phased development and deployment strategy to ensure incremental value delivery.

tasks.title: Monitor and Evaluate Project Success
tasks.description: Set up metrics to measure project success and conduct regular evaluations for continuous improvement.
